Segment.name: L5
Segment.comment: To specify the line item in terms of description, quantity, packaging, and marks and numbers

Field.name: LadingLineItemNumber
Field.comment: Sequential line number for a lading item

Field.name: LadingDescription
Field.comment: Description of an item as required for rating and billing purposes

Field.name: CommodityCode1
Field.comment: Code describing a commodity or group of commodities

Field.name: CommodityCodeQualifier1
Field.comment: Code identifying the commodity coding system used for Commodity Code

Field.name: PackagingCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of packaging; Part 1: Packaging Form, Part 2: Packaging Material; if the Data Element is used, then Part 1 is always required

Field.name: MarksAndNumbers
Field.comment: Marks and numbers used to identify a shipment or parts of a shipment

Field.name: MarksAndNumbersQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying the application or source of Marks and Numbers (87)

Field.name: CommodityCodeQualifier2
Field.comment: Code identifying the commodity coding system used for Commodity Code

Field.name: CommodityCode2
Field.comment: Code describing a commodity or group of commodities

Field.name: CompartmentIdCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the compartment in a compartmentalized tank car
